description: At Italian Restaurant, we serve classic Italian dishes made with fresh ingredients.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, our main courses are prepared with passion.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A delicious photo of lasagna, a traditional baked pasta dish with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: An elegant photo of tagliata di manzo, sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A beautiful photo of risotto ai funghi, creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.
